## My role

- Primary team lead
- Project management
- System design
- Level design
- Implement features including
  - Hexagon-shaped tile map navigation (made an editor plug-in which can be found [here](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/3747))
  - Skill system and 50+ skills
  - Enemy AI
  - Dialogue tagging system
  - UI/UX (menus, skill selection interface)

I have written up more about some aspects of the development (and product management) on this [page](https://battle-tuba-86d.notion.site/Manny-Takes-on-Upper-Management-21c36b6ca99780238cddd05479be9441?pvs=143). Feel free to check it out!
